main event: A couple observed a bright light hovering 50 feet off the ground near Rio Vista, California, on the night of September 8, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as a very bright light that reportedly moved a short distance before ascending rapidly out of view,The couple attempted to get a closer look with a rifle,The sighting lasted less than 5 seconds,No physical evidence was found after the object disappeared,The report includes accounts from local youths who also reported seeing a UFO the following month.
sighted object: a bright light hovering in the sky
witness description: a couple traveling home from Rio Vista
